Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: LKM SQL to DB2 UDB
AUTHOR: Oracle
Description: - Loading Knowledge Module - Loads data from any ISO-92 database to DB2 UDB Targer database. - This module uses Sunopsis Agent to read selected data from the database and write the result in the target temporary table created dynamically. - When using this module on a journalized source table, the Journaling table is first updated to flag the records consumed and then cleaned from these records at the end of the interface. - The WORK_TABLE_OPTIONS allows you to specifiy additional options for creating the temporary C$ table (such as not logged initially or the target tablespace).
Restrictions:
Set this option to NO if you wish to retain temporary objects (tables, files and scripts) after integration. Useful for debugging.

Additional options used when creating the C$ temporary table. You may use this option if you wish to create the temporary table in a nologging mode (transaction is not written to the DB2 log files) or if you wish to specify a tablespace name. Examples: - Disable logging: NOT LOGGED INITIALLY - Specify a tablespace: IN MY_TABLESPACE NOT LOGGED INITIALLY - Compress Values: VALUE COMPRESSION

<% if ("C".equals(odiRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_METHOD"))) { %> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> delete from <%=odiRef.getTable( "L" , "JRN_NAME" , "A" )%> where JRN_CONSUMED = '1' <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

<% if ("C".equals(odiRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_METHOD"))) { %> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> update <%=odiRef.getTable( "L" , "JRN_NAME" , "A" )%> set JRN_CONSUMED = '1' where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

<%if (odiRef.getDataSetMin() != odiRef.getDataSetMax()) {%>select * from (<%}%>
<%for (int i=odiRef.getDataSetMin(); i <= odiRef.getDataSetMax(); i++){%> <%=odiRef.getDataSet(i, "Operator")%> select <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i, "", "[EXPRESSION]\t[ALIAS_SEP] [CX_COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "")%> from <%=odiRef.getFrom(i)%> where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getJoin(i)%> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy(i)%> <%=odiRef.getHaving(i)%> <%}%>
<%if (odiRef.getDataSetMin() != odiRef.getDataSetMax()) {%>) as SRC<%}%>
DEMO.LKM SQL to DB2 UDB.Drop work table
